name: Untitled Space Roguelike
description:
Objective:

A game where you take the role of one of many people trying to make some money off of going out into dangerous space and trying to find loot to sell. If you encounter others, it is likely that they will attack you in an attempt to steal anything valuable you may have. However, not everyone you encounter will be hostile and some will want to bargain for your money by selling you various things. 

Travel through space, collect many things, avoid getting your ship destroyed, and then get out of there!

Controls:

Movement: WASD

Attack: Left Mouse Button (Can be held.)

Inventory: I

Interact: E

Hyperdrive: Space (The hyperdrive renders you immune to damage for a short period of time. There is then a cooldown before it can be used again.)
